name: Puppet Shark Style
text:
Detach 1 material from a monster on the field, and if you do, excavate the top 4 cards of your Deck, choose 1 of them, and apply this effect based on its type, also place the rest on top of the Deck in the same order.
● Monster/Spell: Add it to your hand.
● Trap: Set it. It can be activated this turn.
You can only activate 1 "Puppet Shark Style" per turn.
